Class LocalArtist

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.grabsalot.dao.local.LocalElement
      • net.grabsalot.dao.local.LocalArtist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArtist, ICollectionElement

    public class LocalArtist
extends LocalElement
implements IArtist
    A LocalElement that holds artist specific information.
